channel.title: Shops help PI
channel.description:
okai so i have 1 pk point shop already and it was already added there so yeah...
i want another one because the other one ran out of space. so can somone please tell me how to do it...cause i dont want to mess up the other shop...

item.title: Shops help PI
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

[quote=“Joseph69, post:5, topic:449343”][quote author=blazeitup link=topic=552241.msg4045577#msg4045577 date=1342075593]
Yea… lol ur asking how to make a shop that uses Pk points other than money/cash/gold watever u wanna call it.
[/quote]Dude, calm down he just wants to know how to make it not coins to buy the items, Pkp points.[/quote]
erhm? i dont think i was freaking out… lmao so there really is no need to clam down beacuse i am clam.

item.title: Shops help PI
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

So just take 1 original shop that takes coins , go to shopassistant.java and find the shop id of ur pk point shop that is already in and where it says something with that shop id and pk points add || && shop (shopid) or something like that… im not at my house right now so i cant check what the exact code is but its easy. just look through the folder and ull c 1 and just copy and add it .Sorry if this was unclear just tryna give u an idea

Read full topic
